title: Quiz - Intégration Familiale
description: Quiz sur la présentation de la famille et les relations

questions.question: How do you introduce your family member?
questions.explanation: 'This is my brother' is the correct way to introduce a family member.

questions.question: What's the relationship word for your father's brother?
questions.explanation: Your father's brother is your uncle.

questions.question: How do you describe family relationships?
questions.explanation: 'We are a close family' is the correct way to describe family relationships.
